CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1962, pg. 2, reads: "Was Power Behind Wife - Mr. Illery, Devoted Husband, Succumbs - Major Illery Passes - After funeral services at Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church Tuesday afternoon, the remains of Major Illery were borne by friends to the final resting place, followed by throngs of other friends and admires. He was the husband of Mrs. Alma Illery, president of National Achievement Clubs Inc."
TitMainTitle: Pallbearers carrying American flag draped casket of Major M. Illery to hearse, in front of Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church
